metadata.title: CVE-2021-28678 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.2.0. For BLP data,BlpImagePlugin did not properly check that reads (after jumping to fileoffsets) returned data. This could lead to a DoS where the decoder could berun a large number of times on empty data.

criterions.comment: pillow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
